description: This file contains a unit test for a React component 'App', verifying that it renders a Figma-based game canvas with the correct accessibility role and label.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case that renders the 'App' component and asserts the presence of the game canvas with specific accessibility attributes.

calls: screen.getByRole('application', { name: /Ocean Snake — Figma-integrated interactive canvas/i })
